definition: jacket worn esp. by soldiers in former times, with large insignia on the front and back indicating unit affiliation
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: I don't like wearing the uniform.
I tried on several wedding dresses that had this type of inside support to hold up strapless dresses.
sentences.chinese: 自己試穿過幾件這類從內部支撐樣式地成婚號衣。

sentences.english: Her wedding apparel is made by a very famous fashion designer.
sentences.chinese: 她的結婚號衣是由一位很是聞名的服裝設計師建造的。

sentences.english: Whellote dress hanging in that waiting for the slightesthellont of gray to deceive sad.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的號衣掛在那等待淡淡的灰朦有一絲悲哀。

sentences.english: She tried on her bridal dress.
The groom wears a formal suit or tuxedo.
sentences.chinese: 新郎則穿戴一套正式的西裝或無尾晚號衣。
